verses.roman:
suvarṇa-thālīra anna uttama vyañjana
bhakta-gaṇa-saṅge prabhu karena bhojana

synonyms: suvarṇa-thālīra—on golden plates; anna—rice; uttama—first-class; vyañjana—vegetables; bhakta-gaṇa—the devotees; saṅge—with; prabhu—Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karena—accepts; bhojana—lunch.
translation: Caitanya Mahāprabhu was offered special rice and first-class vegetables on golden plates. He thus took lunch in the company of His devotees.
